title: Elements
description: Styles for html tags. MUST NOT contain styles for any classes, ids, or attributes. `Element` SHOULD use `bits` to construct rule sets.

sections.title: Lists
description: MUST use `$lists_font_size` and `$lists_line_height` variables. SHOULD lay foundational styles for `collection` lists.

sections.title: Forms
description: SHOULD lay foundational styles for `collection` forms.

sections.title: Tables
description: SHOULD lay foundational styles for `collection` tables.
